document.full_text: padraig harrington said he was battling neck pain during his opening-round 77 at the masters on thursday but the irishman plans on coming back to augusta national to play the second round.
document.title: augusta proves to be pain in neck for harrington
lines_and_colors: padraig harrington said he was battling neck pain during his opening-round 77 at the masters on thursday but the irishman plans on coming back to augusta national to play the second round.
